overview: Khloe and her husband Dillon are new to the neighborhood when they catch the eye of their neighbor Aubrey. Aubrey's intrigued by the new neighbors, so she convinces her husband Wesley to go welcome them to the neighborhood. The visit goes great, and Aubrey even brought cookies over to welcome them. The next day, when Khloe leaves for the gym, Aubrey pays Dillon a visit and uses her charm to seduce him. When Khloe gets home, she finds Aubrey's underwear in her husband's jeans and decides she will get the perfect revenge...she will with his best friend Lance.
title: TS Taboo 4 : Cheating Wives
